name: Basic action
description: Basic example of Open Action on Polygon

name: Tipping in any ERC-20 token
description: Enable tipping a Lens user in any ERC-20 token

name: Betting Action
description: Alice challenges Bob to a bet through a bet publication, staking an amount, choosing a deadline and juror(s) (one or multiple people who will decide the result). Bob accept and stakes too. The jurors decide after deadline happens1.

name: Group buying and crowdfunding.
description: Example: Join me in minting this 1 of 1 on SuperRare or Zora

name: ENS
description: Interact with ENS from a Lens app - purchase, renew, or update an ENS domain.

name: Collect on Zora
description: Cross-chain action to enable collecting Zora NFTs from a Lane app.

name: friend.tech
description: Purchase or sell a friend.tech key from a Lens app.

name: Aave
description: Interact with Aave protocol from a Lens app.

name: Uniswap
description: Interact with Uniswap protocol from a Lens app.
